verses.verse: Now a certain <S%H259><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> of the wives <S%H802><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> out to Elisha, <S%H477><s%> "Your servant <S%H5650><s%> my husband <S%H376><s%> is dead, <S%H4191><s%> and you know <S%H3045><s%> that your servant <S%H5650><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> and the creditor <S%H5383><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> my two <S%H8147><s%> children <S%H3206><s%> to be his slaves. <S%H5650><s%>"

And Elisha <S%H477><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, "What <S%H4100><s%> shall I do <S%H6213><s%> for you? Tell <S%H5046><s%> me, what <S%H4100><s%> do you have <S%H3426><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%>?" And she said, <S%H559><s%> "Your maidservant <S%H8198><s%> has <S%H369><s%> nothing <S%H369><s%> <S%H3605><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> a jar <S%H610><s%> of oil. <S%H8081><s%>"

Then he said, <S%H559><s%> "Go, <S%H1980><s%> borrow <S%H7592><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> at large <S%H2351><s%> for yourself from all <S%H3605><s%> your neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> [even] empty <S%H7386><s%> vessels; <S%H3627><s%> do not get <S%H4591><s%> a few. <S%H4591><s%>

"And you shall go <S%H935><s%> in and shut <S%H5462><s%> the door <S%H1817><s%> behind <S%H1157><s%> you and your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and pour <S%H3332><s%> out into all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> vessels; <S%H3627><s%> and you shall set <S%H5265><s%> aside <S%H5265><s%> what <S%H4392><s%> is full. <S%H4392><s%>"

So she went <S%H1980><s%> from him and shut <S%H5462><s%> the door <S%H1817><s%> behind <S%H1157><s%> her and her sons; <S%H1121><s%> they were bringing <S%H5066><s%> [the vessels] to her and she poured. <S%H3332><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when the vessels <S%H3627><s%> were full, <S%H4390><s%> that she said <S%H559><s%> to her son, <S%H1121><s%> "Bring <S%H5066><s%> me another <S%H5750><s%> vessel. <S%H3627><s%>" And he said <S%H559><s%> to her, "There <S%H369><s%> is not one <S%H369><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> more. <S%H5750><s%>" And the oil <S%H8081><s%> stopped. <S%H5975><s%>

Then she came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Go, <S%H1980><s%> sell <S%H4376><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> and pay <S%H9608><s%> your debt, <S%H5386><s%> and you [and] your sons <S%H1121><s%> can live <S%H2421><s%> on the rest. <S%H3498><s%>"

Now there came <S%H1961><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%> when Elisha <S%H477><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to Shunem, <S%H7766><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> there was a prominent <S%H1419><s%> woman, <S%H802><s%> and she persuaded <S%H2388><s%> him to eat <S%H398><s%> food. <S%H3899><s%> And so it was, as often <S%H1767><s%> as he passed <S%H5674><s%> by, he turned <S%H5493><s%> in there <S%H8033><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> food. <S%H3899><s%>

And she said <S%H559><s%> to her husband, <S%H376><s%> "Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> I perceive <S%H3045><s%> that this <S%H1931><s%> is a holy <S%H6918><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> passing <S%H5674><s%> by us continually. <S%H8548><s%>

"Please, <S%H4994><s%> let us make <S%H6213><s%> a little <S%H6996><s%> walled <S%H7023><s%> upper <S%H5944><s%> chamber <S%H5944><s%> and let us set <S%H7760><s%> a bed <S%H4296><s%> for him there, <S%H8033><s%> and a table <S%H7979><s%> and a chair <S%H3678><s%> and a lampstand; <S%H4501><s%> and it shall be, when he comes <S%H935><s%> to us, [that] he can turn <S%H5493><s%> in there. <S%H8033><s%>"
One day <S%H3117><s%> he came <S%H935><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> and turned <S%H5493><s%> in to the upper <S%H5944><s%> chamber <S%H5944><s%> and rested. <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8033><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to Gehazi <S%H1522><s%> his servant, <S%H5288><s%> "Call <S%H7121><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Shunammite. <S%H7767><s%>" And when he had called <S%H7121><s%> her, she stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Say <S%H559><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> to her, 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> you have been <S%H2729><s%> careful <S%H2729><s%> for us with all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> care; <S%H2731><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> can I do <S%H6213><s%> for you? Would <S%H3426><s%> you be spoken <S%H1696><s%> for to the king <S%H4428><s%> or <S%H176><s%> to the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the army <S%H6635><s%>?'" And she answered, <S%H559><s%> "I live <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> my own people. <S%H9415><s%>"

So he said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> then is to be done <S%H6213><s%> for her?" And Gehazi <S%H1522><s%> answered, <S%H559><s%> "Truly <S%H61><s%> she has <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> and her husband <S%H376><s%> is old. <S%H2204><s%>"
And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Call <S%H7121><s%> her." When he had called <S%H7121><s%> her, she stood <S%H5975><s%> in the doorway. <S%H6607><s%>

Then he said, <S%H559><s%> "At this <S%H2088><s%> season <S%H4150><s%> next <S%H2416><s%> year <S%H6256><s%> you shall embrace <S%H2263><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%>" And she said, <S%H559><s%> "No, <S%H408><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> O man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> do not lie <S%H3576><s%> to your maidservant. <S%H8198><s%>"

And the woman <S%H802><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> at that season <S%H4150><s%> the next <S%H2416><s%> year, <S%H6256><s%> as Elisha <S%H477><s%> had said <S%H1696><s%> to her.
When the child <S%H3206><s%> was grown, <S%H1431><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> that he went <S%H3318><s%> out to his father to the reapers. <S%H1><s%>
And he said <S%H559><s%> to his father, "My head, <S%H1><s%> my head. <S%H7218><s%>" And he said <S%H7218><s%> to his servant, <S%H559><s%> "Carry <S%H5288><s%> him to his mother. <S%H5375><s%>"

When he had taken <S%H5375><s%> him and brought <S%H935><s%> him to his mother, <S%H517><s%> he sat <S%H3427><s%> on her lap <S%H1290><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> noon, <S%H6672><s%> and [then] died. <S%H4191><s%>

And she went <S%H5927><s%> up and laid <S%H7901><s%> him on the bed <S%H4296><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and shut <S%H5462><s%> [the door] behind <S%H1157><s%> him, and went <S%H3318><s%> out.

Then she called <S%H7121><s%> to her husband <S%H376><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> me one <S%H259><s%> of the servants <S%H5288><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> of the donkeys, <S%H860><s%> that I may run <S%H7323><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> and return. <S%H7725><s%>"

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Why <S%H4069><s%> will you go <S%H1980><s%> to him today <S%H3117><s%>? It is neither <S%H3808><s%> new <S%H2320><s%> moon <S%H2320><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> sabbath. <S%H7676><s%>" And she said, <S%H559><s%> "[It will be] well. <S%H7965><s%>"

Then she saddled <S%H2280><s%> a donkey <S%H860><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to her servant, <S%H5288><s%> "Drive <S%H5090><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> forward; do not slow <S%H6113><s%> down <S%H6113><s%> the pace <S%H7392><s%> for me unless <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> I tell <S%H559><s%> you."

So she went <S%H1980><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Carmel. <S%H3760><s%> And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> her at a distance, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5048><s%> that he said <S%H559><s%> to Gehazi <S%H1522><s%> his servant, <S%H5288><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> yonder <S%H1975><s%> is the Shunammite. <S%H7767><s%>

"Please <S%H4994><s%> run <S%H7323><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> her and say <S%H559><s%> to her, 'Is it well <S%H7965><s%> with you? Is it well <S%H7965><s%> with your husband <S%H376><s%>? Is it well <S%H7965><s%> with the child <S%H3206><s%>?'" And she answered, <S%H559><s%> "It is well. <S%H7965><s%>"

When she came <S%H935><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> to the hill, <S%H2022><s%> she caught <S%H2388><s%> hold <S%H2388><s%> of his feet. <S%H7272><s%> And Gehazi <S%H1522><s%> came <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to push <S%H1920><s%> her away; <S%H1920><s%> but the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let <S%H7503><s%> her alone, <S%H7503><s%> for her soul <S%H5315><s%> is troubled <S%H4843><s%> within her; and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has hidden <S%H5956><s%> it from me and has not told <S%H5046><s%> me."
Then she said, <S%H559><s%> "Did I ask <S%H7592><s%> for a son <S%H1121><s%> from my lord <S%H113><s%>? Did I not say, <S%H559><s%> 'Do not deceive <S%H7951><s%> me'?"

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to Gehazi, <S%H1522><s%> "Gird <S%H2296><s%> up your loins <S%H4975><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> my staff <S%H4938><s%> in your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> your way; if <S%H3588><s%> you meet <S%H4672><s%> any <S%H376><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> do not salute <S%H1288><s%> him, and if <S%H3588><s%> anyone <S%H376><s%> salutes <S%H1288><s%> you, do not answer <S%H6030><s%> him; and lay <S%H7760><s%> my staff <S%H4938><s%> on the lad's face. <S%H6440><s%>"

And the mother <S%H517><s%> of the lad <S%H5288><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "As the Lord <S%H3068><s%> lives <S%H2416><s%> and as you yourself <S%H5315><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> I will not leave <S%H5800><s%> you." And he arose <S%H6965><s%> and followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> her.

Then Gehazi <S%H1522><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> on before <S%H6440><s%> them and laid <S%H7760><s%> the staff <S%H4938><s%> on the lad <S%H5288><s%>'s face, <S%H6440><s%> but there <S%H369><s%> was neither <S%H369><s%> sound <S%H6963><s%> nor <S%H369><s%> response. <S%H7182><s%> So he returned <S%H7725><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> him and told <S%H5046><s%> him, "The lad has not awakened. <S%H9516><s%>"
When Elisha <S%H477><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into the house, <S%H1004><s%> behold <S%H2009><s%> the lad <S%H5288><s%> was dead <S%H4191><s%> and laid <S%H7901><s%> on his bed. <S%H4296><s%>
So he entered <S%H935><s%> and shut <S%H5462><s%> the door <S%H1817><s%> behind <S%H1157><s%> them both, <S%H8147><s%> and prayed <S%H6419><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And he went <S%H5927><s%> up and lay <S%H7901><s%> on the child, <S%H3206><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> his mouth <S%H6310><s%> on his mouth <S%H6310><s%> and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> on his eyes <S%H5869><s%> and his hands <S%H3709><s%> on his hands, <S%H3709><s%> and he stretched <S%H1457><s%> himself on him; and the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the child <S%H3206><s%> became <S%H2552><s%> warm. <S%H2552><s%>

Then he returned <S%H7725><s%> and walked <S%H1980><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> once <S%H259><s%> back <S%H2008><s%> and forth, <S%H2008><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up and stretched <S%H1457><s%> himself on him; and the lad <S%H5288><s%> sneezed <S%H2237><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> and the lad <S%H5288><s%> opened <S%H6491><s%> his eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And he called <S%H7121><s%> Gehazi <S%H1522><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Call <S%H7121><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Shunammite. <S%H7767><s%>" So he called <S%H7121><s%> her. And when she came <S%H935><s%> in to him, he said, <S%H559><s%> "Take <S%H5375><s%> up your son. <S%H1121><s%>"

Then she went <S%H935><s%> in and fell <S%H5307><s%> at his feet <S%H7272><s%> and bowed <S%H7812><s%> herself to the ground, <S%H776><s%> and she took <S%H5375><s%> up her son <S%H1121><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> out.

When Elisha <S%H477><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> [there was] a famine <S%H7458><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%> As the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> were sitting <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, he said <S%H559><s%> to his servant, <S%H5288><s%> "Put <S%H8239><s%> on the large <S%H1419><s%> pot <S%H5518><s%> and boil <S%H1310><s%> stew <S%H5138><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the prophets. <S%H5030><s%>"

Then one <S%H259><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out into the field <S%H7704><s%> to gather <S%H3950><s%> herbs, <S%H219><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> a wild <S%H7704><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%> and gathered <S%H3950><s%> from it his lap <S%H899><s%> full <S%H4393><s%> of wild <S%H7704><s%> gourds, <S%H6498><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> and sliced <S%H6398><s%> them into the pot <S%H5518><s%> of stew, <S%H5138><s%> for they did not know <S%H3045><s%> [what they were.]

So they poured <S%H3332><s%> [it] out for the men <S%H376><s%> to eat. <S%H398><s%> And it came <S%H1961><s%> about as they were eating <S%H398><s%> of the stew, <S%H5138><s%> that they cried <S%H6817><s%> out and said, <S%H559><s%> "O man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> there is death <S%H4194><s%> in the pot. <S%H5518><s%>" And they were unable <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> to eat. <S%H398><s%>

But he said, <S%H559><s%> "Now bring <S%H3947><s%> meal. <S%H7058><s%>" And he threw <S%H7993><s%> it into the pot, <S%H5518><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> "Pour <S%H3332><s%> [it] out for the people <S%H5971><s%> that they may eat. <S%H398><s%>" Then there was no <S%H3808><s%> harm <S%H1697><s%> <S%H7451><s%> in the pot. <S%H5518><s%>

Now a man <S%H376><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from Baal-shalishah, and brought <S%H935><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> of the first <S%H1061><s%> fruits, <S%H1061><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> loaves <S%H3899><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> and fresh <S%H3759><s%> ears <S%H3759><s%> of grain <S%H3759><s%> in his sack. <S%H6861><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H5414><s%> [them] to the people <S%H5971><s%> that they may eat. <S%H398><s%>"

And his attendant <S%H8334><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "What, <S%H4100><s%> shall I set <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%>?" But he said, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H5414><s%> [them] to the people <S%H5971><s%> that they may eat, <S%H398><s%> for thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'They shall eat <S%H398><s%> and have [some] left <S%H3498><s%> over. <S%H3498><s%>' "
So he set <S%H5414><s%> [it] before <S%H6440><s%> them, and they ate <S%H398><s%> and had [some] left <S%H3498><s%> over, <S%H3498><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
